Public Remarks: WELCOME TO ABBOTSFORD'S PREMIER LIVING COMMUNITY  Eagle Mountain is Abbotsford's premier living community. A master-planned residential development located in East Abbotsford with stunning views overlooking Mount Baker, surrounding mountains and the farms of the Sumas prairie. Luxuriating in the highest standard of craftsmanship using exceptional materials sculpted to perfection, set within a private garden oasis. Whether for intimate gatherings or large-scale entertaining, this 6-bed, 8-bath, masterpiece makes an exquisite statement. Boasting a stunning two-storey foyer & great room, sweeping staircase & a formidable dining room bedecked with chandelier lighting and bespoke millwork. Top grade Italian marble honed to perfection throughout. Stately library, 700 bottle climate-controlled wine cellar, 8 wet bars, self-cleaning, indoor heated pool with Jacuzzi, sauna & steam shower.
